name: Technical duplicate content
notes: Redirect one web property to the other/update server-side configuration.

name: www. Duplication
notes: Redirect one web property to the other/update server-side configuration.

name: Robots.txt
notes: Â¿El sitio utiliza un archivo robots.txt? Se aplica por subdominio el robots.txt

name: XML Sitemaps
notes: Add an XML sitemap to the site.

name: Noindex  Tags
notes: Remove noindex tags from important pages.

name: Crawlable Navigation
notes: Implement crawlable HTML or HTML rollback to navigation.

name: New Backlinks
notes: Work with PR and marketing team to ensure that the brand is credited with a link when mentioned in news-worthy articles.

name: Low Quality Backlinks
notes: Review the low quality links and contact webmasters to remove links. Consider adding links that cannot be removed to disavow file and uploading to Google Search Console.

name: Deep links
notes: Identify existing backlinks that could link to a more relevant page other than the homepage (thereby improving user experience). Build links to deeper pages within the website.

name: Social Shares
notes: Work with PR and social teams to increase the number of pages shared socially.

name: Mobile Page Load Speed
notes: Perform a page speed test and fix critical issues in order to improve page load time for all devices.

name: Product Images
notes: Add additional product images to each product.

name: Intuitive Form Fields
notes: Implement a CTA strategy to improve user flow throughout the site.

name: Meta Descriptions
notes: Create and implement optimized meta descriptions.

name: H1 Tags Missing
notes: Create and implement optimized h1 tags on core pages.

name: Excessive H1 Tags
notes: Alter header tag structure to ensure there is only one h1 per page.

name: Heading Semantics
notes: Implement correctly structured semantic mark-up.

name: Rich Media
notes: Add a h1 tag to the homepage.

name: Thin Content
notes: Remove thin content or add text to pages with thin content.

name: Duplicate Local Listings
notes: Review locations and remove duplicates as required.

name: Reviews On Local Listings
notes: Develop a client review process.

name: Analytics Platform
notes: Implement an analytics solution such as Google Analytics.

name: Analytics Code Missing
notes: Add analytics tracking code to all pages on the website.

name: Analytics Code Duplication
notes: Remove multiple analytics tracking codes that could be affecting data quality.

name: Tagging Position
notes: Move analytics tracking/tag management code to correct position in HTML source.

name: No Tag Management Solution
notes: Implement a tag management solution.
